original: 廣漢郪縣人，蜀漢官員。為李朝、李邈之弟，另有一弟早亡，名不詳。與李朝和早亡之弟並稱李氏三龍。
text: A native of Li County, Guanghan, an official of Shuhan. He was the younger brother of Li Chao and Li Miao, and another brother died early, whose name is unknown. Together with Li Chao and his brother who died early, they are also called Li's Three Dragons.
